46.title: Load Testing with Docker and ECS

46.longDescription: Generating load on a service is hard. Docker and ECS makes it easier.

45.title: YAML for Configuration
45.shortDescription: JSON is good at a lot of things. Just not configuration files.
45.longDescription: JSON is good at a lot of things, which led me to think it's great for configuration files. But it's not. YAML is the way to go.

43.title: Using Ansible and Vagrant to Launch Ubuntu 16.04

43.longDescription: I've been impressed with Vagrant and with Ansible, but my provisions always took an extra step on Ubuntu 16.04. How to get Vagrant to install Python before provisioning the box.

42.longDescription: Using RabbitMQ to separate application logic from transactional email logic.

40.longDescription: The default user agent header set by NSURLRequest is awful. Do yourself a favor and change it.
